data.prayer: Spirit, guide the 274,299 believers in the county of Deyang into all truth as they interpret Scriptures.
data.verse: For the word of God is alive and active. Sharper than any double-edged sword, it penetrates even to dividing soul and spirit, joints and marrow;

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Deyang, Sichuan, China
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, we pray the believers are good spiritual stewards of their everyday relationships in Deyang, Sichuan, China.

data.section_summary: On average, 4 babies will be born in the next hour to families who are far from God in Deyang, Sichuan, China.
data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to these new families.
Jesus, remind the disciples in the county of Deyang to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

data.prayer: Father, please help good, online teachers get the gospel on YouTube and into the the county of Deyang.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Naru people.
Father, make bold the prophets in Deyang, Sichuan, China so that the church can be equipped with truth and insight and a vision of your heart.
data.verse: These are the things which you should do: speak the truth to one another; judge with truth and judgment for peace in your gates.

data.prayer: Father, be a refuge and strength for the hurting in Deyang, Sichuan, China today.
data.verse: God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.

data.section_summary:
the county of Deyang, Sichuan, China has a population of 3,615,800.

We estimate Deyang has 274,299 people who might know Jesus, 58,413 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 3,283,089 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 13 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the county of Deyang
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.
